name: 4.10 "The Bar Stoolie" Online Quiz | 'Cheers'- Season 4 | 10 Questions

questions.text: What was Norm's message to Woody's parents on the tape recorder?
questions.explanation:
"Hi folks, this is Norm."

	Diane recorded a really long message so there was not much left on the tape when Norm talked. Woody apologized but Norm said that was all he had to say.

questions.text: What did Diane call Sam's date?
questions.explanation:
bimbo du jour.

	Diane had always thought that Sam dated really dumb women. She thought that she was the best thing for Sam because she provided some intellectual stimulation.

questions.text: What was the name of the woman Sam went out with?
questions.explanation:
Claudia.

	Claudia was played by Claudia Cron. She started her career as a model for Estee Lauder.

questions.text: What did Cliff say C.O.D. stood for?
questions.explanation:
Cliffie on demand.

	Cliff liked to brag that he had a lot of women interested in him. In fact, Cliff was very awkward around women and dated very little.

his father.

	Cliff's father abandoned his family when Cliff was very young. Cliff found it very hard to forgive his father, but when his father showed up to Cheers, he did forgive him.

questions.text: Who became friends with Sam's date?
questions.explanation:
Diane.

	Claudia was actually not a bimbo like Diane first thought. She ended up having a lot in common with Diane and invited her to dinner.

questions.text: Who sat alone at dinner on Sam's date?
questions.explanation:
Sam.

	Sam called to make sure that there was only a table for two at the restaurant. This plan backfired because Diane ended up eating with Claudia leaving Sam to eat alone.

questions.text: Wh did Sam's date breakup with Sam?
options: She fell in love with the waiter at dinner.
questions.explanation:
He came on too strong.

	Sam had one goal in mind, to get Claudia in bed. He kept making comments and innuendos that finally led to her leaving him after their first date.

questions.text: What did Sam and Diane argue over?
questions.explanation:
who still liked who.

	Their fighting tended to annoy the other people at Cheers. Both liked the other, but neither were willing to admit it.

Australia.

	Cliff's father was on the run from the law. He was wanted for real estate fraud. He wanted to take Cliff with him but Cliff turned him down. When Cliff tried to turn his father in, he just couldn't do it.
